title: Shin Jidai
content:
Being a One Piece fan is just a gift that keeps on giving and these related projects are proof of it.

I have only come to know of Ado as I got the news about Film Red, and man what a great mashup was that a match made in heaven, and out of all of her songs, New Genesis is just icing on the cake. The song fits the mood of the movie so well and this music video only gives it a great standing as a standalone release. It's more of a chilled out song, plays out a the beginning of the movie but definitelystuck in memory for how catching it is.
